description.narrative: By 2021, children will receive quality education, with qualified and motivated teachers, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Learning Outcomes (Covid), Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, children of pre-primary and primary age (girls and boys), and especially those living in the most disadvantaged areas, complete the relevant cycle for their age.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, children will receive quality education, with qualified and motivated teachers

description.narrative: UNICEF developed a resource mobilization strategy which allowed the education section to secure funds from donors on a multi-year basis and to leverage resources from other partners for advancing the government priorities in the education sector and to improve quality of education and learning through the teacher initial and continuous training, capacity building of parents. This funding strategy helped boost up involvement of diversified partners from upstream level with the development of the ESP through the implementation at the local level with the decentralized authorities and communities in school management, development of pre-learning / pre-primary education, distribution of school material. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of schools targeted by UNICEF that meet the quality standards defined in the sector plan
Number of trained teachers in primary education in UNICEF supported zones
Sector plan include National developed "quality standards"

target.value: 2021:Dissemination and operational strategy to implement the plan

title.narrative: Curricular are revised to take into account "gender" and "conflict"

actual.value: 2019:Gender and peace building have been integrated in teacher programme but not the curricula
